name: Best Electronic ORG
description:
The only realistic electronic org and musical instruments learning app with new songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners! Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your iPhone or iPad!

Features

- Multi Different colors piano keyboards and musical instruments: Piano keyboard, Small Piano, Organ, ...
- Piano Tiles and Magic Keys mini games
- Single keyboard
- Piano songs
- Piano HD
- No need for Wi-Fi to Play for more fun.

Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better and more interesting!
